text: @realDonaldTrump Keep obama name out of your mouth! You’re not worthy to speak his name! Obama hasn’t killed Americans here and abroad! Obama hasn’t broke the law! Obama didn’t hire crooks! Obama worked for the people! You killed them! #COVID19 #HeKnew #LiesLiesLies
